heroText: A comprehensive app designed to simplify managing your store, products, and customer orders. We provide innovative and user-friendly tools to grow your business, enhance customer experience, and boost your success in the world of commerce.
heroTitle: Everything your store needs in one place with
exploreSubTitle: A simple and seamless user interface that allows you to easily purchase car spare parts.

about.title1: Manage Your Store Professionally, From Idea to Success
about.text1: The Market app is the perfect tool for store owners to manage their e-commerce markets effectively. Store owners can add their markets, manage product categories, track inventory, and improve their sales performance. The app allows you to easily add new products, track customer orders, and provide exceptional service to enhance customer satisfaction. With comprehensive reports and detailed analytics, you can make well-informed decisions to grow your business. We provide you with all the tools you need to professionally manage your store, organize your orders and sales, helping you achieve success and growth in the market.
about.title2: Control Your Services and Easily Meet Your Customers' Needs
about.text2: The ideal solution for service providers to manage their business and meet customer requests efficiently. The app allows you to add services like property painting, carpentry, and other services you offer. You can manage your schedules, accept or reject orders, and easily track the status of each order. The app provides a user-friendly interface, allowing you to deliver exceptional service, with the ability to manage and follow up on all order details professionally. We are here to help you improve your performance and achieve customer satisfaction through fast and reliable service.

features.title: App Features
features.text: Provides you with innovative and easy-to-use tools to grow your business
features.f1Text: Track the status of each order from submission to delivery, with instant notifications for every update.
features.f2Text: Get accurate reports on sales, inventory, and orders to make data-driven decisions.
features.f3Text: We ensure the protection of your data and your customers' privacy using advanced security technologies.
features.f4Text: Our support team is always available to assist you and resolve any issues as quickly as possible.

downloadAppSub: Everything for your store in one place. Easier management, greater success with Amara Market.
enjoy_experience: Enjoy a seamless and fast shopping experience with our app
app_description: Our app is designed to make shopping simple and convenient. Hereâ€™s how it works in a few easy steps
browse_description: Browse a wide range of products available across different stores. Easily search for any product you want.
favorites_description: If you find a product you like, you can add it to your favorites list to return to it later.
cart_description: Once you find the products you wish to buy, easily add them to your shopping cart.
store_products_description: Add your store and products to the app easily, and organize categories and inventory.
track_orders_description: Track customer orders in real-time and manage inventory and sales efficiently.
view_reports_description: Review sales, inventory, and order reports to make strategic decisions for your business.
add_services_description: Add your services like property painting or carpentry, and manage them professionally to meet your clients' needs.
manage_orders_description: Accept or decline orders and keep track of their status to complete them efficiently.
rate_experience_description: After completing the service, you can rate your experience and share feedback with your clients.
